ops_per_clock_notes.note: Edge TPU ONLY supports INT8. No FP32/FP16/BF16 support. TensorFlow Lite models with full INT8 quantization required.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (500 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Ultra-low power edge AI accelerator. 4 TOPS INT8 @ 2W. INT8 ONLY (no FP support). Uses host CPU memory. 14nm process. USB/M.2/PCIe variants. ~$25-75 depending on form factor. For IoT, cameras, drones.
